entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 5:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NE 76 km/h gust 87 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near noon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
